bug.author: hn2
bug.description: I'm not sure if it is a bug or not, however, when training a model, no tensorboard logs are written. Possibly it is due to my python envrionment (below). I do see model running (verbose=1) and it is also writing monitor csv file to the same directory defined as tensorboard directory. Python 3.6.11 torch 1.6.0+cu101 also installed: tensorboard 1.14.0 tensorboardX 2.0 tensorflow 1.14.0 tensorflow-estimator 1.14.0 tensorflow-gpu 1.14.0

comments.comment: Hello, Please fill up the issue template COMPLETELY. If we have an issue template, it is not for it to be ignored ;) <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hn2>@hn2</denchmark-link> you were banned from SB2 issues for that exact same reason (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/hill-a/stable-baselines/issues/380>hill-a/stable-baselines#380</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hill-a/stable-baselines/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Ahn2+is%3Aclosed>https://github.com/hill-a/stable-baselines/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Ahn2+is%3Aclosed</denchmark-link> , opening many issues without following the rules and filling up the issue template), this your on this repo.
